name: Beaded sliding knot macrame bracelet
description:
Handmade macrame irish waxed linen bracelets made to order. Here are a few examples of the different bead and chord colours you may choose from:

Chord:
Denim
Maroon (also available in nylon satin) ♥
Turquoise
Black
Teal ♥
Mint Green ♥
Pink
Charcoal

Glass Pearl beads:
White Pearl ♥
Pink
Green
Turquoise♥
Lavender 
or Silver ♥

You may choose up to 3 different bead colours per bracelet ☮

Bracelets are made with sliding knots for an ajustable wrist fit ☮

When ordering please specify which colour chord / beads you would like ☮ - you can chose which one in the drop down box below - and email with your second choice - e.g. White pearl bead (drop down box) and email - charcoal chord with your name :)

All profits received will go towards funding my trip to Thailand in the New Year, thank you so much to anyone who buys! ☮
